title: Waveshare ESP32-S3 dev board integrates 4.3” Touch LCD
description: Waveshare has unveiled a versatile development board incorporating the ESP32-S3 SoC and a 4.3” capacitive touch display, making it ideal for projects requiring a touch interface and connectivity. This board is especially suitable for developing Human-Machine Interfaces, IoT devices, and other interactive applications. At the core of this Waveshare development board is the Espressif Systems […]
